title: Scott Lawrence
subtitle: CTO - WINR
description:
I've had the pleasure of working with Guy for the past four years and highly recommend him as both a skilled full-stack developer and a great person to have in a tech team.

Guy handled all aspects of the WINR front-end products - this included designing and developing our marketing sites, our consumer sites and the WINR AdGate product.

The latter was a custom JavaScript product that enabled publishers to obfuscate content on their sites - until the consumer engaged with the advertising within the AdGate. Guy handled all aspects of the architecture and implementation of the product, ensuring it worked correctly on all mobile & desktop environments and creating the initial AWS Lambda (Serverless) backend to control the display of ads and recording of user sessions and statistics.

As the product matured, Guy adapted the technology to work with commercial ad platforms (Xandr/AppNexus and Kevel/Adzerk), integrated the product to work within the Header Bidding ecosystem and developed a front-end for our AdOps teams to mange advertising campaigns and publishers.

On the backend, Guy introduced the (NodeJS-based) serverless platform into the company, and integrated it with our AWS API Gateway/Bitbucket/CircleCI CI/CD environment.

Guy manages his time extremely well (especially given that the majority of his time was working remotely across the country) and consistently delivers his projects on or ahead of time.

Guy will be a great asset to any company.
